infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to help you organize and manage your photos by swiping to keep or delete them.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow SwipeClean to access your photos so you can organize them by swiping.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow SwipeClean to save photos to your device.

storeListing.title: SwipeClean - Photo Organizer
storeListing.shortDescription: Organize photos with simple swipe gestures - keep right, delete left
storeListing.fullDescription: SwipeClean makes photo organization effortless and fun! Clean up your camera roll with intuitive swipe gestures. Swipe right to keep photos, left to delete them. Features trash recovery, beautiful blue interface, and smooth workflow without confirmation dialogs. Perfect for organizing vacation photos, cleaning screenshots, and freeing up storage space.
